freeDBIdToMusicBrainzId

public java.lang.String freeDBIdToMusicBrainzId(java.lang.String freeDBId)
                                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                                java.text.ParseException,
                                                ReleaseNotFoundException
Resolves a freedb id to a musicbrainz id, via a web lookup. Throws releasenotfoundexception if no release found.

Throws:

queryReleases

public java.util.List<Release> queryReleases(java.lang.String title,
                                             java.lang.String discId,
                                             java.lang.String artist,
                                             java.lang.String artistId,
                                             java.lang.String releaseTypes,
                                             int count,
                                             java.util.Date releaseDate,
                                             java.lang.String asin,
                                             java.lang.String language,
                                             java.lang.String script,
                                             boolean cdStubs,
                                             int limit)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
Queries releases, returning results.

Parameters:
title - Fetch a list of releases with a matching title
discId - Fetch all releases matching to the given DiscID
artist - The returned releases should match the given artist name
artistId - The returned releases should match the given artist ID (36 character ASCII representation). If this is given, the artist parameter is ignored.
releaseTypes - The returned releases must match all of the given release types. This is a list of space separated values like Official, Bootleg, Album, Compilation, etc.
count - Number of tracks in the release
releaseDate - Earliest release date for the release
asin - The Amazon ASIN
language - The language for this release
script - The script used this release
cdStubs - Indicates whether to include CD stubs in the result or not. By default CD stubs are included.
limit - The maximum number of releases returned. Defaults to 25, the maximum allowed value is 100.
Returns:
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

queryReleases

public java.util.List<Release> queryReleases(java.lang.String title,
                                             java.lang.String discId,
                                             java.lang.String artist,
                                             java.lang.String artistId,
                                             java.lang.String releaseTypes,
                                             java.lang.Integer count,
                                             java.util.Date releaseDate,
                                             java.lang.String asin,
                                             java.lang.String language,
                                             java.lang.String script,
                                             java.lang.Boolean cdStubs,
                                             java.lang.Integer limit,
                                             MusicBrainiac.ReleaseInclude... includes)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
Queries releases, returning results.

Parameters:
title - Fetch a list of releases with a matching title
discId - Fetch all releases matching to the given DiscID
artist - The returned releases should match the given artist name
artistId - The returned releases should match the given artist ID (36 character ASCII representation). If this is given, the artist parameter is ignored.
releaseTypes - The returned releases must match all of the given release types. This is a list of space separated values like Official, Bootleg, Album, Compilation, etc.
count - Number of tracks in the release
releaseDate - Earliest release date for the release
asin - The Amazon ASIN
language - The language for this release
script - The script used this release
cdStubs - Indicates whether to include CD stubs in the result or not. By default CD stubs are included.
limit - The maximum number of releases returned. Defaults to 25, the maximum allowed value is 100.
includes - items to include in the release results
Returns:
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
